parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns servers information of Steam friends currently playing the game.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> <template><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Does '''not''' work in multiplayer - returns an empty array.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getSteamFriendsServers]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Array]] of [[String]]s - to format [ipAndPort, steamFriendName]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getSteamFriendsServers]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns e.g [["127.42.33.8:2302", "MyFriend"], ["127.84.66.16:4604", "My Best Friend"]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isMultiplayer]] [[connectToServer]]
</value></part></template></root>
